name: Dreamer.
description:
Click through the scene to find keys and progress through the puzzle!

*Find the Magnifying Glass  to unlock a hint of the events that transpired* 

Story Inspired by the lore of my current RPG project Rising Spire

Journey through this eerie world as you find keys to unlock the mysteries of past events that led to your untimely death! 

Game Jam: Game Dev Unlocked

Theme: Unlocked

Controls: 

  • Full demo can be played with using a mouse only
  • (Optional) 'A' to move scene left
  • (Optional) 'D' to move scene right

Details: Currently in the process of moving but I really wanted to try my hand at a game jam. I'd like to get better at making games that are widely accessible by all types of players so this was a great learning opportunity. If I had more time I would have fixed a few bugs, made some QoL changes, added 2 more scenes to uncover the whole past, and added unique SFX for each of the objects selected. Overall I'm happy with the way the game turned out! 

P.S. Thanks for playing & have a great day! :)

- Vomdrache

Asset List:

  • Title BGM
  • Game BGM
  • Artwork (Loved their work so much. So I bought their $9.99 house pack)
  • UI
  • LeanTween
  • SFX
